statements: SELECT * FROM user_progress WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, level FROM user_progress WHERE game_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM user_progress WHERE progress > 0.5;
SELECT user_id, game_id, level, progress FROM user_progress WHERE level = 3;
SELECT user_id, game_id, progress FROM user_progress ORDER BY progress DESC;
SELECT user_id, game_id, level, progress FROM user_progress WHERE user_id = 1 AND game_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, game_id, level, progress FROM user_progress WHERE progress > 0.5 ORDER BY user_id DESC, level ASC;
SELECT user_id, AVG(progress) AS avg_progress FROM user_progress GROUP BY user_id HAVING avg_progress > 0.3;
SELECT user_id, game_id, MAX(progress) AS max_progress FROM user_progress WHERE level <= 5 GROUP BY user_id, game_id;
SELECT user_id, game_id, SUM(progress) AS total_progress FROM user_progress WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3) GROUP BY user_id, game_id ORDER BY total_progress DESC;
SELECT user_name, progress_percentage FROM user_progress
SELECT user_id, last_login FROM user_progress
SELECT * FROM game_levels
SELECT game_name, level_name, required_score FROM game_levels WHERE required_score > 500
SELECT level_id, game_name FROM game_levels ORDER BY level_id DESC
SELECT * FROM user_progress WHERE progress_percentage > 50;
SELECT user_name, progress_percentage FROM user_progress WHERE last_login > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_name, progress_percentage FROM user_progress WHERE progress_percentage < 25 ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM game_levels WHERE required_score >= 100 ORDER BY level_id DESC;
SELECT game_name, level_name FROM game_levels WHERE game_name = 'Puzzle Game' AND required_score < 200;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM progress WHERE level_completed >= 5 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT level_id, level_name, difficulty_level FROM game_levels WHERE difficulty_level = 'Hard' ORDER BY level_name;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'JohnDoe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM progress WHERE level_completed > 10 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT users.username, progress.level_completed FROM users JOIN progress ON users.user_id = progress.user_id WHERE users.username = 'Alice';

SELECT game_levels.level_name, progress.level_completed FROM game_levels JOIN progress ON game_levels.level_id = progress.progress_id WHERE game_levels.difficulty_level = 'Hard' ORDER BY progress.level_completed DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT MAX(required_score) AS max_score FROM game_levels;
SELECT achievement_name, reward_points FROM achievements WHERE reward_points > 50 ORDER BY reward_points DESC;

SELECT users.username, game_levels.level_name, user_progress.current_score FROM users JOIN user_progress ON users.user_id = user_progress.user_id JOIN game_levels ON user_progress.level_id = game_levels.level_id ORDER BY user_progress.current_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC, user_id ASC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE date_joined > '2021-01-01';
SELECT level_name, required_score FROM game_levels WHERE required_score BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY level_name;
SELECT user_id, level_id FROM user_progress WHERE current_score >= 500 ORDER BY level_id ASC;
SELECT achievement_name, reward_points FROM achievements WHERE reward_points > 50 ORDER BY reward_points DESC, achievement_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT game_name, release_date FROM games ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, game_id, level_completed FROM user_progress WHERE level_completed > 5;
SELECT level_name, game_id FROM game_levels WHERE game_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM users JOIN user_progress ON users.user_id = user_progress.user_id;
SELECT game_name, release_date FROM games WHERE release_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM game_levels ORDER BY level_name DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, game_id, MAX(level_completed) AS highest_level_completed FROM user_progress GROUP BY user_id, game_id;
